body_content.explanation: used to emphasize that something is very unpleasant or bad:
examples: I was in a stinkingly foul mood yesterday.
More generally, this demonstrates just how stinkingly rotten our whole system is.
The whole house was stinkingly dirty.

body_content.explanation: If someone is stinkingly rich, they are extremely rich:
examples: Not satisfied with being stinkingly rich, they are revoltingly snobbish too.
While many stinkingly rich families are dysfunctional, this family sticks together.
He is quite possibly the most stinkingly wealthy man in the world.
